name: Evade 2
description:
Evade 2 is an Arduboy game developed by Modus Create as a holiday gift to friends and family in December 2017. This is the unofficial Playdate port.

The original Arduboy version boasted being the first first-person flight sim on the Arduboy with the following (taken from the forum)

  • 3 x enemies
  • 3 x “Aces” (think bosses)
  • 11 total songs
  • Space Balls (don’t crash into them!)
  • Smooth scalable vector graphics

This version adds the following:

  • Upscaled high-res assets to take advantage of the Playdate's amazing screen
  • Additional unused assets from the original version: longer songs, additional cockpit graphics
  • Persistent high scores and statistics
  • Menu toggles for music, sound effects, and inverted controls

The control scheme remains largely the same as the original version.

Like the original, this is released under an MIT license and the source code is available on GitHub.
